tasks.label: build-debug-local
tasks.detail: dotnet build command for debugging the application locally

tasks.label: clean-debug-local
tasks.detail: dotnet clean command for cleaning the local application debug build

tasks.label: clean-debug-arm
tasks.detail: dotnet clean command for cleaning the application build for the armhf target

tasks.label: clean-debug-arm64
tasks.detail: dotnet clean command for cleaning the application build for the arm64 target

tasks.label: watch-local
tasks.detail: dotnet watch command, watch the changes on the application, compile it and reload automatically

tasks.label: try-update-template
tasks.detail:
This task has automation steps to update the project
based on the template used to create it.

tasks.label: try-update-template-accepting-all
tasks.detail:
This task has automation steps to update the project
based on the template used to create it.

tasks.label: create-production-image
tasks.detail:
This task has automation steps to build the production
Docker image. The production Docker image
is based in the Dockerfile file.

tasks.label: fill-pipeline-settings
tasks.detail:
This task will fill the properties that are needed to be
set in the .vscode/settings.json to correctly
run the GitHub Actions or GitLab CI pipelines.
args:
-e
"✅ github-actions-settings done

'⚠️  ENV VARIABLES NEED TO BE SET IN CI/CD PLATFORM'
	DOCKER_PSSWD
	PLATFORM_CLIENT_ID
	PLATFORM_CLIENT_SECRET
	PLATFORM_CREDENTIALS
"

tasks.label: platform-update-fleet
tasks.detail:
This task will trigger the update of the fleet in the
Torizon Platform with the latest version
of the application published to the platform.

tasks.label: tcb-platform-publish
tasks.detail:
This task will build the production image based on the
Dockerfile and push it to the Torizon
Platform creating a new docker-compose package.

tasks.label: docker-login
tasks.detail: Perform a docker login on the host

tasks.label: check-deps
tasks.detail:
This task will check if the dependencies needed to run
the project are installed in the host machine.

tasks.label: reload-vscode-window
tasks.detail: Reloads this VSCode window (workspace)

tasks.label: containers-cleanup
tasks.detail: Docker compose down on the target (default device)

tasks.label: pre-cleanup
tasks.detail: Clean the service of the application on the target (default device)(does not down the dependencies)

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-release-arm64
tasks.detail: This task will build the application based in the production Dockerfile, push it to the local registry (localhost:5002), pull it on the board and run it on the board, showing the result in the VSCode terminal

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-release-arm
tasks.detail: This task will build the application based in the production Dockerfile, push it to the local registry (localhost:5002), pull it on the board and run it on the board, showing the result in the VSCode terminal

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-release-amd64
tasks.detail: This task will build the application based in the production Dockerfile, push it to the local registry (localhost:5002), pull it on the board and run it on the board, showing the result in the VSCode terminal

tasks.label: show-project-documentation
tasks.detail:
This task will open the project specific documentation
in a new tab.
